sections.PURPOSE: of this training is to instruct, evaluate, and certify drivers of tactical vehicles IOT increase the licensed vehicle operator population of Bull Troop and to increase driving proficiency.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Conduct Phase I, II, and III Driver’s Training
Maintain serviceability of equipment Exercise safe practices while driving and throughout training
sections.END STATE:
Bull Troop certifies 3x drivers per vehicle, avoids damage to equipment, and avoids injury to personnel.
Training Objectives:
Understand Army and Army in Europe driving forms and regulations
Understand Operator Technical Manuals
Demonstrate proper PMCS procedures
Properly operate controls of specific vehicle type
Complete vehicle control test
Complete vehicle road test
8x lanes
100 m
150 m
Resourcing
Primary Instructor: SSG Daum Master Driver: SSG Ramirez
5x LE/LI (2x ICV-J, 2x ICV-D, 1x FMTV)
5x Vehicles (2x ICV-J, 2x ICV-D, 1x FMTV)
